<Text: Zhao Qinggang:  His 89.15 m personal best throw, set in 2014, is the Chinese record.
Triplets:<Zhao Qinggang

Text: Zhao Qinggang:  He is the 2014 Asian Games champion.
Triplets:<Zhao Qinggang

<Text: Zhao Qinggang:  At the East Asian Games he was the runner-up in 2009 and winner in 2013.>
